mapper.select: SELECT gno, gname, stock, gdetail, price, dir, savename FROM goods g, img i WHERE g.ino = i.ino AND gno = #{gno}
SELECT cano, caname FROM category WHERE upno IS NULL
SELECT cano, caname FROM category WHERE #{cano} = upno
SELECT gno, gname, savename, dir, price FROM goods g, img i WHERE g.ino = i.ino AND cano = #{cano}

select c.gno gno, c.gname gname, c.price price, c.cano cano, i.dir dir, i.savename savename from ( SELECT gno, cano FROM goods g, img i WHERE gno = #{gno} and g.ino = i.ino ) s, goods c, img i where s.cano = c.cano and c.ino = i.ino
select gno, gname, savename, dir, price from goods g, category c, img i where g.cano = c.cano AND g.gno = i.ino AND gname like '%' || #{gname} || '%'
